ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: CMOS. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TV Lines. Signal System: NTSC standard
Built-in 36 LEDs IR Illuminators. Built-in light sensor controls IR activation. Minimum Illumination: 0.0 lux
Built-in 6mm Lens and built-in microphone and audio circuit
Metal body housing, mount and sun shade. Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application
Package included: 1 of bullet camera, 1 of camera bracket, 1 of 12V DC power supply and 1 of security warning sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Audio Microphone IR-Cut Filter Bullet Security Camera Outdoor Day Night 520TVL High Resolution 36 Infrared LEDs for Home CCTV DVR Surveillance System with Power Supply and Bonus Security Warning Sticker AB1
